item.title: I want to edit the rank of current commands
item.dc:creator: @whitenite whitenite
item.description:
@whitenite wrote:

Open notepad , and copy this there

@echo off COLOR 0c title Darkscape Source Compiling... echo Compiling Darkscape. Please Wait... javac *.java pause

Save that file as: compile.bat
Then open again notepad and copy this there

@echo off COLOR 0c title Darkscape Source Running. Log-In Now! echo YourScape has sucessfully started! Please Log-In Now! java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

save that file as : runserver.bat

compile.bat -compiles your server
runeserver.bat -start your server

Read full topic

item.title: I want to edit the rank of current commands
item.dc:creator: @Diseal3 Diseal3
item.description:
@Diseal3 wrote:

Yes I hit compile and then ran server still dosent go through here ill paste what i have in my compile:

@echo off
COLOR 0c
title Darkscape Source Compiling…
echo Compiling Darkscape. Please Wait…
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
title Darkscape Source Running. Log-In Now!
echo YourScape has sucessfully started! Please Log-In Now!
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar
serverpause

EDIT: It says compiling then bunch of text and closes… I think its erroring out

Read full topic

item.source: I want to edit the rank of current commands

item.title: I want to edit the rank of current commands
item.dc:creator: @whitenite whitenite
item.description:
@whitenite wrote:

[quote=“Diseal3, post:1, topic:35000”]I have some commands on my server already, and I need to know how to make it so that certain commands can only be use by mods and admins for example, I went into client.java and Looked around for the command and I found it and what it does

			if (command.startsWith("stuff")) {

			addItem(4670,1);
			addItem(4671,1);
			addItem(4672,1);
			addItem(4673,1);
			addItem(4674,1);
			addItem(5092,1);
				}

How can I make it for example that command only be used by admins?[/quote]

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("stuff") && playerRights >= 2) { addItem(4670,1); addItem(4671,1); addItem(4672,1); addItem(4673,1); addItem(4674,1); addItem(5092,1); }
If you want to make it that only you can use this command then

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("stuff") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Your Name here")) { addItem(4670,1); addItem(4671,1); addItem(4672,1); addItem(4673,1); addItem(4674,1); addItem(5092,1); }

Read full topic

item.description:
@Diseal3 wrote:

I have some commands on my server already, and I need to know how to make it so that certain commands can only be use by mods and admins for example, I went into client.java and Looked around for the command and I found it and what it does

			if (command.startsWith("stuff")) {

			addItem(4670,1);
			addItem(4671,1);
			addItem(4672,1);
			addItem(4673,1);
			addItem(4674,1);
			addItem(5092,1);
				}

How can I make it for example that command only be used by admins?
